segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks so determined to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the stool wobbling, and it makes me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's not paying attention to how unstable it is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if he knows how dangerous that is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl next to him is waiting for a cookie, completely oblivious to the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I should warn them to be careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't fall and hurt themselves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene is so tense, yet they seem so happy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel a bit worried for them.
segments.speaker: PAR
